definition: half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
switch to a job one was not trained for
lit. Cheng Yaojin ambushes the enemy (saying)/fig. sb shows up unexpectedly and disrupts the plan/sb whose presence is regarded as irksome
pinyin: ban4 lu4 sha1 chu1 ge4 Cheng2 Yao3 jin1

definition: see 半路殺出個程咬金|半路杀出个程咬金[ban4 lu4 sha1 chu1 ge4 Cheng2 Yao3 jin1]
pinyin: ban4 lu4 sha1 chu1 de5 Cheng2 Yao3 jin1

sentences.english: We had to push the car home as it broke down half way and we couldst know how to repair it.
sentences.chinese: 半路上車拋錨了，我們又無從修理，只得將其推回。

sentences.english: Half way up the Brightness Hill, Reed Flute Cave is seven kilometers northwest of the center of Guilin.
sentences.chinese: 半路上的亮度，蘆笛巖是西北七公里的桂林的中心。

sentences.english: Our car conked out when we had got only halfway.
sentences.chinese: 我們的汽車剛走到半路就出了毛病。

sentences.english: Harry supposed that the wind must have caught him in mid- jump.
sentences.chinese: 哈利猜想大概是風半路上把他託上去了。

sentences.english: In the half-way did not expect we will encounter such a good view.
sentences.chinese: 沒想到在半路上還會遇到這麼好的景色。

sentences.english: Halfway up the hill,the engine pooped out.
sentences.chinese: 在上山的半路上，發動機熄火了。

sentences.english: The gardeners and their helpers, who were busy chasing off the rabbit, fell asleep in mid-chase.
sentences.chinese: 園丁和幫手們，在忙碌的抓兔子，抓到半路就睡着了。

sentences.english: Affinity for the two people in the halfway of the Crackdown.
sentences.chinese: 有緣的是，兩個人在半路就遇着了。

sentences.english: We have to pick up Dashan and Yunbo on the way.
sentences.chinese: 我們半路上還要接大山和雲波呢。

sentences.english: We can stop off half way to have our lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以在半路上停車喫午飯。

sentences.english: It is perhaps with the Health and fear come, perhaps halfway flowering.
sentences.chinese: 它或許是與生懼來的，或許是半路開花。

sentences.english: Julia suddenly stopped in her mid-tracks.
sentences.chinese: 這時，茱莉亞突然在半路上停了下來。

sentences.english: Come all right on the way, railroad car hind transmits successive knock sound, nightmare arrives at this point.
sentences.chinese: 行至半路，車廂後傳來連續的敲擊聲，噩夢就此降臨。

sentences.english: How the hell did we drop that fucker?
sentences.chinese: 我們是怎麼把那個操蛋玩意兒給丟在半路上的？

sentences.english: They don’t start cleaning the bathroom and stop halfway through.
sentences.chinese: 他們清洗廁所時不會半路停下來。

sentences.english: But halfway we lost and never find out when we went to see the trees.
sentences.chinese: 不料半路迷路，一直找不到我們去時看到的那片樹林。

definition: on the road/on a journey/road surface
just by chance/to happen to (just at the right time)/opportune
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
by the way/while out doing sth else/conveniently
too bad/unfortunately/as luck would have it
to leave in stealth/to slip away
